text: is a 1929 Japanese comedy movie directed by Yasujirō Ozu and starring Ichirō Yūki, Tatsuo Saitō, Junko Matsui, Chōko Iida, Eiko Takamatsu, Shōichi Kofujita, Ichirō Ōkuni. It was distributed by Shochiku. ==Other websites== * Category:1929 comedy movies Category:Silent movies Category:Japanese comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Yasujirō Ozu
title: Days of Youth
